pageContent: Objectives: To assess the ability of preoperative prostate-specific antigen level, Gleason score and stage to predict prostate cancer outcomes beyond biochemical recurrence, specifically castration-resistant prostate cancer, metastases and prostate cancer-specific mortality in radical prostatectomy patients.

metaData.source:
The awareness of women on prostate cancer: a mixed-methods systematic review protocol
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33143724/
